親愛的合作夥伴，
感謝您聯絡foodpanda！
謹在此通知您，您的 [接單裝置 / goDroid 接單程式 / 打印機 / SIM卡 - 連線上網 ] 問題已經解決！
小貼士: 如遇到接單裝置問題，可嘗試重新啟動裝置！根據我們的經驗，重新啟動裝置常能夠解決90%的技術問題。 ​ 請長按接單裝置左側頂端的小按鈕來重新啟動：
步驟一：長按開關20秒重新開機，請確保接單裝置已連接電源線。 步驟二：在主畫面顯示全白同時放開按鈕。 步驟三：等候5秒，系統將會重新開始至主畫面。
如果仍未能解決，請透過 夥伴支援申請表格 ，我們會盡快聯絡您並提供進一步解決方法。
祝 順心 foodpanda夥伴支援團隊
Dear Panda Partner,
Thank you for submitting your request.
Please note that your [ Hardware Issue / goDroid App Issue / Printer Issue / SIM card connectivity Issue ] has been solved!
Warm Reminder: If your tablet is experiencing any issues, please first try to restarting the tablet. From our experience, restarting the tablet usually solves 90% of technical issues.
The following are instructions on how to restart your tablet:
Step 1: Press the power button for 20 seconds to force-restart and make sure your power cable is plugged in. Step 2: The screen will go blank and goes to full restart mode. Step 3: Wait for a few seconds until you see your usual home screen.
If you need further assistance, kindly complete the Partner Support Request Form with all the required information related to your request.
Stay hungry,
Your foodpanda Partner Support team
